name: ChessTris (Magnarokk)
description:
This game is a combination of Tetris and Chess, having to move the pieces around the board to achieve a certain number of blocks on the ground layer, using the controller or arrow keys to move around, climbing on top of other pieces to push the ones higher up down to lower levels.

The more points you have, the harder the game gets. The board increases in size and the pieces that fall get bigger and fall more often.
